---
name: ⚖️ Forensic Non-Conformance Report
about: Report a failure in tool accuracy, validation, or evidence integrity.
title: "[NON-CONFORMANCE] - Brief Description"
labels: critical, legal-risk
---

## Description of Failure
Provide a detailed description of the discrepancy between the tool output and the expected result.

## Regulator Reference
Which FSR/NIST standard does this failure impact?
- [ ] FSR Code v2: Validation
- [ ] FSR Code v2: Evidence Integrity
- [ ] ISO 17025: Accuracy/Precision

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Use Gold Image: [e.g., NIST-Android-16]
2. Run Module: [e.g., triage-ai]
3. Result: [e.g., Incorrectly identified deepfake as authentic]

## Impact on Admissibility
How does this affect existing cases?
